overview:
Max is the founder of Wishcan, which provides a social sourcing platform for users to acquire goods, services, or information by recruiting the help of his friends on social networks and others fellow users. Max is also currently studying at Stanford University Graduate School of Business for a Masters degree in Business Administration.

Prior to founding Wishcan, Max led negotiations for Chang Chun Plastics in Taiwan. He was responsible for multi-million dollar licensing and business agreements with multiple international companies.

Prior to negotiating for Chang Chun Plastics, Max was the founder and CEO of Yabbyland, based in Sydney, Australia. Yabbyland developed a C2C procurement platform, and provided web development services to local businesses.

Max has a BSc in Genetics, BA in Psychology, and a BSc Honours in Biotechnology.

degrees.subject: Biotechnology
degrees.institution: The University of New South Wales

relationships.title: Assistant to the Vice President for Technology
